page.title: 16CHURCH LAWTON LOCAL NEWS
page.content: {OVERWHELMED BY LAWTON GIFT TO { Dr. BARNARDO'S. { Church Lawton Primary School pupils made an overwhelming donation to Dr. Barnardo's last week. They presented area organiser Mrs Sally Caldwell with a Â£369 cheque from a junior sponsored safety quiz and infants colouring day. Their efforts followed a visit to the school by Mrs Caldwell in May when she explained the work carried out by their charity. Mrs Caldwell said after the presentation, "I was quite overwhelmed by the response from the children. It was a wonderful amount of money, and it will be used for caring for children in the North West." (Congleton Chronicle June 1985)
